column17:
If you are fond of sneakers this pair of shoes from Puma is sure to get you hooked on with its looks! The creative design of the exteriors have been inspired by artistic wall graffiti. Serving you comfort at each step these shoes could be a worthy addition to your wardrobe.

Style Tip
Team up these shoes with tracksuits or with denims and tees for a complete look.

Specifications
Colour: Black
Usage: Casual Sports
Style: Laced

Care Tips
Gently brush away dust or dirt using a soft cleaning brush.
You can also use a dry soft sponge or hand towel to restore surface.
